title: NFL ATL: Divisional Round Weekend recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Divisional Round Weekend recap
description:
A room full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus and Chris Wesseling -- recap all of the action from the Divisional Round Weekend and look ahead to the Conference Championships. Learn all about the new school vs. old school Super Bowl scenarios and find out if Colin Kaepernick is in the social hot seat. Also, help the heroes by voting for them as the best sports commentary for the 2013 Stitcher Awards at stitcher.promotw.com. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
